back.text:
DeepSeek, founded in 2021 by former Baidu and Google researchers, has rapidly emerged as a significant player in the AI landscape, particularly known for its high-performance open-source models. The company has established a reputation for technical excellence, releasing models that demonstrate exceptional capabilities across language understanding, code generation, and reasoning tasks.

DeepSeek's model portfolio spans multiple domains with varying specializations. Key offerings include:

• DeepSeek-V2: The company's core large language model with strong reasoning and language capabilities
• DeepSeek-V3: Enhanced foundation model with advanced reasoning and knowledge integration
• DeepSeek-Coder: Specialized model for programming across multiple languages with strong code generation abilities
• DeepSeek-MoE: Mixture of Experts implementation for enhanced efficiency and performance
• DeepSeek-RL: Reinforcement learning system for alignment and preference optimization

The company has embraced open-source principles for many of its models, contributing to the broader AI ecosystem while building commercial applications and services. DeepSeek's research focus spans foundation model development, alignment techniques, and specialized applications in areas like coding and scientific research. As a newer entrant in the AI landscape, DeepSeek represents the growing innovation emerging from companies outside the dominant Western tech giants, contributing to a more diverse global AI ecosystem.
